title: Returning Materials: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Books from Northwestern libraries as well as interlibrary loan books checked out through Northwestern may be returned at book drops outside of the University (Main) Library, Deering Library, and Mudd Library. You may return books by mail to Northwestern University LibrariesATTN: Circulation1970 Campus DriveEvanston, IL 60208 For shipments outside the U.S., please use a trackable mail service.  If you have any questions about shipping, please email library@northwestern.edu.
